author: costin
msg: Expanded ServletWriter ( with methods from JspParseEventListener ). Still
need to be simplified, by adding few more callbacks ( and allowing
generators to play with more methods )

author: costin
msg: It should be moved in parser, it is no longer involved in the code generation,
only in extracting the info from the JSP page using the parse events.

author: costin
msg: Moved out of JspParseEventListener, to simplify the code

author: costin
msg: Compiler is the main entry point to jasper ( from container ), will be
in core. ( but needs some refactoring to improve the interfaces )

author: costin
msg: The comment generator is now integrated in the java code generator.
Better mapping will follow soon ( by generating a static map from java line
numbers to source locations and parsing the stack traces )
